stop_voice_transcription.title: Stop Recording (aipacenotes)
stop_voice_transcription.desc: Tells the desktop app to stop recording. Does not create a new transcript. Requires AI-Pacenotes desktop app.

cut_voice_transcription.title: Cut Voice Transcription (aipacenotes)
cut_voice_transcription.desc: If a recording is running, this stops it and immediately starts another. Requires AI-Pacenotes desktop app.

toggle_recce_drawDebug.title: Toggle Recce Pacenotes Visualization (aipacenotes)
toggle_recce_drawDebug.desc: Toggle the drawing of visual markers for pacenotes.

recce_move_pacenote_forward.title: Move Pacenote Forward in Recce (aipacenotes)
recce_move_pacenote_forward.desc: Move the next pacenote toward CornerStart along snaproad and save notebook.

recce_move_pacenote_backward.title: Move Pacenote Backward in Recce (aipacenotes)
recce_move_pacenote_backward.desc: Move the next pacenote towards vehicle along snaproad and save notebook.

recce_move_vehicle_forward.title: Move Vehicle Forward in Recce (aipacenotes)
recce_move_vehicle_forward.desc: Move the next vehicle toward CornerStart along snaproad and save notebook.

recce_move_vehicle_backward.title: Move Vehicle Backward in Recce (aipacenotes)
recce_move_vehicle_backward.desc: Move the next vehicle towards vehicle along snaproad and save notebook.

rallyEditorCycleDragMode.title: Rally Editor - Cycle Drag Mode (aipacenotes)
rallyEditorCycleDragMode.desc: Cycle between drag modes (simple, simple+road snap, free edit w/gizmo)

rallyEditorInsertMode.title: Rally Editor - Focus Note Edit Field (aipacenotes)
rallyEditorInsertMode.desc: Shortcut to focus the cursor on editing the currently selected note text.
